scripts.dev:aws: npx dotenvx run --env-file=.env -- npm run dev
scripts.dev:drizzle-generate: npx dotenvx run --env-file=.env.development -- npx drizzle-kit generate
scripts.dev:drizzle-push: npx dotenvx run --env-file=.env.development -- npx drizzle-kit push:pg
scripts.dev:drizzle-studio: npm run dev:drizzle-generate && npm run dev:drizzle-push && npx dotenvx run --env-file=.env.development -- npx drizzle-kit studio
scripts.dev:db-setup: npm run dev:drizzle-generate && npm run dev:drizzle-push
scripts.drizzle-studio: npm run drizzle-generate && npm run drizzle-push && npx drizzle-kit studio
